info.name: Dark and compact [Volafile.io]
info.description:
This is a dark, neat, and compact theme/style for the website 'http://volafile.io/'
Choose your own fonts and accent colours. An intensely dark theme. Great for sharing your precious secrets at night.
info.additionalInfo:
----------------
 How to install:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 i. Download the 'Stylish' extension because its top shit heck yeah go go go
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Updates
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 006 | 20/08/14 (current)
 - Looks like i was bothered to make sum changes
- nevermind its hsit

 005 | 12/02/14 
 - Added Unregistered Users color
 - Added Customizable file scroll background colour
 - My birthday!!! Yay!!!
 
 004 | 15/01/14 
 - Fixed thumbnail scheme
 - Fixed loading splash

 003 | 07/01/14 
 - Added registered user name colour selection
 - Fixed pause, play, stop and download buttons

 002 | 23/12/13 
 - Fixed startup overlay colour
 - Renamed standout colour to accent colour

 001 | 18/12/13 
 - Fixed tag border radius
 - Changed textarea
 - Added color selection
 - Added font selection
 - Made admin text bg more subtle
 - Fixed uploading colors
 - Credit to GNUsux for the easy tag bundle
 
 ---

 The main colours are:
 #5A5A5A, #202020, #CDCDCD and #181800.
 Please give feedback and tell me if there are any bugs. 
 I will try to reply in the time being if possible.

 - trigwig 
 ( email me at: triggu@volafile.io )
 ( you can visit me at http://volafile.io./r/BEEPi )
 site: http://mukkd.web.fc2.com/
